name: Catnap (mewmewstudios)
description:
Catnap is a 3rd person shooter game where a space police, Andy, infiltrates a distant planet to rescue his kitten that was abducted by the aliens.
 Controls

WASD/Arrow Keys to move.

Left Mouse Click to shoot using your laser blaster!

Q to summon a way pointer, it will help you to show you directions to progress the game!

ESC to pause your game.

Known bugs

1. If you don't follow the way pointer and skipped to other parts of the game, the way pointer will still redirect the player to older objectives and in some cases will stop working properly.

2. The gem counter will not show up if you skipped to collecting gems that is until you talk to the alien grunt.

3. Falling to the abyss will not respawn the player.
